prompt.bodyText: Please select an option below to continue using Alcumus.

trialExtended.header: Your free trial has been extended by <1>7 days!</1>

contactSales.header: We’re happy to hear you’re interested in subscribing!
contactSales.bodyLine1: Our sales team will be reaching out to you shortly to schedule a meeting.
contactSales.bodyLine2: In the meantime, we will be <1>extending your free trial.</1>
contactSales.bodyLine3: We look forward to speaking with you soon!

salesAlreadyContacted.header: You’ve already requested to speak with us.
salesAlreadyContacted.body: We are unable to process your request.

trialExtensionEnded.header: Your free trial extension has come to an end.
trialExtensionEnded.body: To continue using Alcumus, you will need to upgrade to a paid subscription.

alreadyExtended.header: You have already extended your free trial.
alreadyExtended.body: We are unable to process your request.
